name: MVB 2.11
desc: Your vision is filled with an array of monitors, desktops, and flesh. At this time in particular, first-year computer science students are having a C lab - the room is packed.

paths.name: Talk to a TA
paths.desc: You talk to a TA, who promptly tells you to go away.

paths.name: Turn on a computer
paths.desc: You turn on a computer and type in your username, but you've forgotten your password. What do you guess?

paths.name: dog123
paths.desc: The screen flashes red. You got it wrong!

name: Hackspace
desc: The sound of the lazer cutter and Oliver is shouting 'WHY WONT MY FUCKING RECEPIT PRINTER WORK!?'.

paths.name: Talk to Oliver
paths.desc: Oliver gets enraged and smashes the printer on the floor. Bits of srapnell hit you in the face. You are in pain. That was not a safe decision.

paths.name: Talk to James
paths.desc: You talk to James. He tells you, in a stern voice, 'don't plug that power supply in.'

paths.name: 3D print cutlery
paths.desc: You spend hours upon hours 3D printing some cutlery. Ian Hoyler finds you slumped in a chair whilst slowly going insane...

name: Upper Atrium
desc: There are stressed students on several coloured sofas in this vast, open plain.

paths.name: Sit on a sofa
paths.desc: You sit down on a sofa and try to do some coursework with your friends. You end up talking to your friends for too long and don't get much accomplished.

rand_enc.desc: David May stops to have a chat with you about the Computer Architecture Computer. You waste 5 hours of time.
Nick Wu sees that you are struggling with Haskell and gives you private tuition
You see the BEEES commitee members advertising for the upcoming make-a-thon

name: Lower Atrium
desc: No one is playing table tennis

paths.name: Play table tennis
paths.desc: You spend a good 5 minutes playing against your self. Wouldn't it be better if you had a friend?

paths.name: Do some work
paths.desc: You connect your laptop to the screen but end up just playing Minecraft. A person sits down next to you...

paths.name: Talk to them
paths.desc: You talk to them. It turns out they don't have an OOP partner yet. You sign up as a pair

paths.name: Walk away
paths.desc: That was a bit rude. You might of missed out on a great friendship :'(

rand_enc.desc: A class has just left MVB 1.11

rand_enc.name: Simon Locke walks past you and has a joke with you. Your day has been made

desc: You knock on the door once. You hear a packet of crips slowly being eaten. A soft voice tells you to 'come in'. You enter. You see Cian in front of you with his Macbook eating crips. What a beautiful man
